已过时的 API

目录
  • 已过时的类
  • 已过时的字段
  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的构造方法
已过时的类
com.easemob.chat.EMChatDB
          This class will soon be removed, please stop using this class and you can find related functions in EMChatManager 
com.easemob.chat.EMCmdManager
           
 

已过时的字段
com.easemob.chat.NotificationCompat.FLAG_HIGH_PRIORITY
          Use NotificationCompat.Builder.setPriority(int) with a positive value. 
com.easemob.chat.CmdMessageBody.params
            
 

已过时的方法
com.easemob.chat.EMChatManager.addConnectionListener(ConnectionListener)
          please use new API addConnectionListener(final EMConnectionListener listener) instead 
com.easemob.chat.EMGroupManager.createGroup(String, String, String[])
          使用 createPublicGroup 和cretePrivateGroup 
com.easemob.chat.EMConversation.getIsGroup()
          已过时 
com.easemob.chat.NotificationCompat.Builder.getNotification()
          Use NotificationCompat.Builder.build() instead. 
com.easemob.chat.EMChatOptions.getNotificationEnable()
          已过时,使用getNotifyBySoundAndVibrate()替代 
com.easemob.chat.EMGroupManager.joinGroupsAfterLogin()
            
com.easemob.chat.EMChatManager.removeConnectionListener(ConnectionListener)
          use {@link removeConnectionListener(EMConnectionListener listener) instead 
com.easemob.chat.EMChatOptions.setNotificationEnable(boolean)
          已过时 使用setNotificationEnable(boolean value)替代 
 

已过时的构造方法
com.easemob.chat.CmdMessageBody(String, HashMap)
          已过时,使用CmdMessageBody.CmdMessageBody(String action)
